title: Sci Fi Cerberus Bundle
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! Sci Fi Cerberus Bundle Offers you three of our selected packs of a value of $61.00 for less than Half the Price!
longDescription:
Sci Fi Cerberus Bundle offers game developers three of our asset packs featuring, Sci Fi Machina, Sci Fi Exodus & Sci Fi Levels for an outstanding offer of only $24.99!!!!!! WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 !


Our brand is to support Independent developers on their journey of making a game that they want to make including the music they vision in their developments. In this product bundle we have a total of 30 music asset loops designed for Sci Fi action, tension & use in menu/loading screens as well as intense game play.


Level your game development up with the Cerberus May 2021 Bundle asset pack TODAY.


LISTEN TO SCI FI MACHINA HERE - https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/cyberworld-machina-cyber-music/s-yCi6VbslLf2


LISTEN TO SCI FI EXODUS HERE - https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-exodus-preview/s-Bf0ns5ocLRV


LISTEN TO SCI-FI-LEVELS HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-preview/s-JP3jFqYY5fv


Please email us directly at Cerberus_Audio@outlook.com for product help, questions & any other enquiries.


Thank you.


C Audio
